item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Career and Education 2023 - Present Research Associate at School of Mathematical and Computer Sciences, Heriot-Watt University, Edinburgh, UK; working on several EPSRC-funded projects about mathematical theory of polycrystalline materials with Prof. John Ball, Dr David Bourne, Dr Lucia Scardia. 2022 - 2023 Research Fellow at School of Mathematics, University of Birmingham, UK; working on an EPSRC-funded project about analysis of evolutionary PDEs as gradient flows arising from Optimal Transportation Theory with Dr Hong Duong; organising the Reading Group on Mathematics of Data Science (see Events).

item.title: Events
item.description: Uncertainty quantification and stochastic modelling of materials; Cambridge, UK, 10 July 2023 - 1 September 2023; A research programme at Isaac Newton Institute for Mathematical Sciences; website. New Mathematics for the Exascale: Applications to Materials Science; UCLA, Los Angeles, USA, 13 March - 16 June 2023; A research programme at Institute for Pure & Applied Mathematics (IPAM); website. Research visit to Laboratoire de Mathématiques de Besançon (Université Bourgogne Franche-Comté); Besançon, France, 7-11 November 2022; hosted by Geneviève Dusson; research topic: uncertainty quantification for interatomic potentials.
